landing.welcome: Welcome to my FullStack Developer Portfolio

home.description: I 'm a developer specialized in building exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I focus on creating accessible and robust web applications that solve real problems.

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: Hi! I'm Ricardo Perez, FullStack developer. My career in web development as a freelancer started in 2021 and, since then, I have grown professionally learning new technologies.
about.bio2: I specialize in web application development using modern technologies such as Angular, React, Node.js, .NET and SQL/NoSQL databases. I focus on creating modern and intuitive web/apps backed by robust and scalable backend architectures.
about.bio3: In my spare time I always try to update my repertoire. I strongly believe in continuous learning and am always exploring new technologies and methodologies to improve my skills.

job1.title: Freelancer Developer
description: I have applied my knowledge in JavaScript/TypeScript, C# and .NET in a variety of projects to solve complex challenges.
Where I gained experience developing with React, Angular, Node.js, Express.js and managing various databases (MongoDB, MS SQL Server, PostgreSQL), always looking for the best technological solution.

project0.title: Multitenant Lottery App with .NET Microservices, Angular, MongoDB and SqlServer. (In Development)
project0.description: This multitenant application is built on a .NET microservices architecture, with dedicated services for authentication and queries that leverage EF Core to manage data in SQL Server and MongoDB in a hybrid way. On the frontend, a SPA developed in Angular and TypeScript provides an intuitive interface for managing sweepstakes and raffles, communicating with the microservices via HTTP and keeping the configuration isolated per tenant.

project1.title: E-commerce Platform
project1.description: A complete e-commerce platform with shopping cart, payment gateway, and admin panel.

project2.title: Task Management App
project2.description: Task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, custom labels, and real-time collaboration.

project3.title: Weather Dashboard
project3.description: Interactive dashboard that displays real-time weather forecasts with data visualizations and custom alerts.

project4.title: Blog Platform
project4.description: Blog platform with rich text editor, comment system, and integrated traffic analytics.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to get back to you!
